mapper.update: update locate_info set l_add_name = #{lAddName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, l_end_name = #{lEndName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, l_add_ip = #{lAddIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, l_end_ip = #{lEndIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, l_price = #{lPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},o_id l_type = #{lType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, l_pei_yong = #{lPeiYong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, l_pei_yongs = #{lPeiYongs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where l_id = #{lId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update locate_info set l_type = #{type} where l_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select l_id, l_add_name, l_end_name, l_add_ip, l_end_ip, l_price, l_type, l_pei_yong, l_pei_yongs from locate_info where l_id = #{lId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select l_id, l_add_name, l_end_name, l_add_ip, l_end_ip, l_price, l_type, l_pei_yong, l_pei_yongs from locate_info
